restlib

Class ClientPreferencesWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.ClientPreferences
      • restlib.ClientPreferencesWrapper

  • @Immutable
public class ClientPreferencesWrapper
extends ClientPreferences
    An implementation of ClientPreferences which forwards all its method calls to another instance of ClientPreferences. Subclasses should override one or more methods to modify the behavior of the backing ClientPreferences as desired per the decorator pattern.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ClientPreferencesWrapper(ClientPreferences delegate)
      Constructs an instance of ClientPreferencesWrapper that forwards all method calls to delegate.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Preference<Charset>> acceptedCharsets()
      Indicates which character encodings are preferred in a response payload.
      Set<Preference<ContentEncoding>> acceptedEncodings()
      Indicates which response content-codings are preferred in ta response payload.
      Set<Preference<Language>> acceptedLanguages()
      Indicates which natural languages that are preferred in a response payload.
      Set<Preference<MediaRange>> acceptedMediaRanges()
      Indicates which content types are preferred in a response payload.
      Set<Preference<TransferCoding>> acceptedTransferEncodings()
      Indicates which transfer-codings are preferred in a response.
      Optional<Range> range()
      The ranges requested by the client.
